m:MaterialTitle.title: Static Chip
m:MaterialTitle.description: Static chips cannot be selected, removed or edited, and are not part of any model.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Contact Chips
m:MaterialTitle.description: Contact chips represent contact information that users have for people in a compact way. They are invoked and inserted into a text field (usually the To field) when the user starts typing a contactâ€™s name, sees the contactâ€™s addresses, and selects the correct one. Contact chips can be added directly to a text field from a menu of contacts. Contact chips efficiently confirm that the user will be sending their message to the correct person.
